answers.answer: When I started measuring I was at 8 in. From bust line to bump/belly button. Now I am at 14 in. From bust line to bump/belly button. I'm worried

No it's my second. The first I had twins at 37 wks 4 days I didnt drop  with them or  even dialate. I had a csec with them for preeclampsia but wasnt having any signs of labor. So its practically all new to me with this single baby

question: I have been measuring my length and I have been dropping an average of 1 inch a week , since week 29........I have been measuring larger and further along than my lmp due date since my first u/s at 8 weeks. Should I worry about preterm labor? My bump sits in my lap now.
title: Is it normal to drop at around 32 weeks?
